name: Space War Defense - Aliens of the Star Tower
name_original: Space War Defense - Aliens of the Star Tower
description:
# Play on watch or phone
# Various types of enemies
# Make the right decision, pick the right gun for each target. SECRET Tips: Small targets --> small guns; big targets --> big guns.
# Blast them to pieces to save the earth
# Different play modes, limit coin or time
# Get the game FREE

Let's the kill begin!
